pr_title: Fix Reactive PG and MySQL Clients initialization

timeline.message:
Reactive PG Client quick fix

- make sure the PgPoolProducer is initialized before the StartupEvent is
fired

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we do the same in ReactiveMySQLClientProcessor ?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: IDK. I was asked to fix this one ;-). But if it's using the same pattern then yes... I'll take a look.
replies.author: mkouba

timeline.message:
Reactive MySQL Client fix

- make sure the MySQLPoolProducer is initialized before the StartupEvent
is fired
